column4: Any idea what could cause my laptop to overheat (it worked perfectly fine with Intrepid, but after the upgrade to Jaunty, I've alread had 3 "emergency shutdowns" :( )
the hardware is fine, I just upgraded the distribution. (and yes I checked the CPU fan already).

naturally it's possible that Gnome is so much more resource intense, but OTOH, in Intrepid I've been running vuze, which provided the box with a nice background load avg of 1 at all times without problems.
